column5: Don't you hate the last cast of the day?
Not if it catches me a fish!    But if that happens.... it's not the last cast
Good point. I'm the same way. If I do get something on the last cast then I'll cast a few more times just on case.
not on saturday...  i caught 100 walleye jigging then trolled up 5 more...  my arms hurt so bad the last cast was a relief...  but most days... yes... the last cast sucks
Days where they're so bad that you can't wait til your buddy calls it? Had a few, but more often than not it'll be my last cast now, after about 5 more casts on top of that. Lol.
For me it's like, time to go more that anything else
last cast/drift never ends up being the last one
I'm sure I speak for everyone when I say that if it were up to us anglers,  we'd fish every second of the day, every day.
Yup, last cast is always a hard one to call. It's usually pre-empted by several of these groans " ..welllllllllllllll..."
Good point Sinclair.
This fall I have been wanting to keep drifting and drifting,but there comes a time when ya cant drift no more.
Before you know it, ice fishing will be upon us. ??
Then you get to walk out of the bush in the dark, lol.  That's always fun!
Ah I see we fish at diffrent times Bill. I walk in when it,s dark and leave when theres light.LOL
Oh my, sometimes my last cast happens consecutively for an hour or two. Last Cast can also mean, "as soon as my spool runs empty, I'm done"
The "LAST" cast....thats so sad  Almost like "The Last Post".I kinda expect to hear a soulful,lone bugle in the distance.
In the boat, I always call last cast. About a dozen or so casts later, i say out loud, "Be the bigger man" and put my rod away.
I always say "Well, I guess that's it eh Dad?".  He says "Yep, I guess it's that time".   Then when he is putting his lure back in the box I continue to fish.  I snicker to myself everytime.
Yer cruel.
thats ok. Make sure last cast is at the opposite end of the lake...gives you a long way to troll back

I think I've made dozens of last casts on occasions. My father would eventually cut my line out of nowhere or somehow run away with my rod to end the day. I can't say I hated it though because it would always leave me laughing.
i object to the idea of a "last cast" as long as im still above sod....but sometimes there are long delays between them though
Ah yes...  The self proclaimed last cast..
... last cast for me is when i realize i can go home if i want to , genrealy caused by fatigue and hunger.
